meta.title: xo.center
meta.tagline: A quiet map of the constellation — what exists, what it’s for, where it lives.

cards.title: Ledger
cards.headline: The memory that does not forget.
cards.body: A public timeline of receipts — small entries, big clarity.

cards.title: Vault
cards.headline: What is sealed can be trusted.
cards.body: Signatures, bundles, provenance — plus an inbox for replies.

cards.title: Pulse
cards.headline: Where signals become artifacts.
cards.body: Updates that can be referenceified if needed.

cards.title: Digest
cards.headline: One day. One page.
cards.body: A calm daily mirror: what changed, what matters, where to look next.

cards.title: Drops
cards.headline: Collectibles as containers.
cards.body: Images, traits, lore — and ongoing replies that keep it alive.

cards.title: Constellation
cards.headline: How the pieces relate.
cards.body: A quiet map of systems, flows, and alignment over time.

changelog.title: Changelog
changelog.subtitle: One line you can update in 10 seconds.
bullets: 2026-02-20 — xo.center map stabilized; status table updated.

footer.left: XO is a public surface with a private key — calm by design.
